name: Sonic & Shadow
description:
The creator of Sonic Souls presents his new project, Sonic & Shadow, which also makes the leap to the latest technology from Epic Games (Unreal Engine 5).

Again, this is a game developed by a single person

The story develops the relationship between Sonic and Shadow who will have to work together when they are involved in an incident that takes them to an alternate future timeline.

The full game consists of three open worlds and 15 linear stages. To unlock the linear phases (Routes) you need to get temporary crystals that are scattered both in the world and along the same routes. More advanced routes also require you to have completed a specific number of routes.


Right now you can download the version 0.3 of the game where you can play the first open world and 6 routes. (You can use the same save game in all future updates).

The game has full controller support (Xbox controller recommended)
